崱字的基本解释

崱
zè
〔屴（
l?）崱〕见“屴”。

崱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zè］
［《廣韻》士力切，入職，崇。］
亦作“1”。
(1)参差不齐貌。
(2)见“崱屴”、“屴崱”。

崱字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　崱； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页315第16
【廣韻】士力切【集韻】【韻會】寔側切，?音萴。崱屴，山大貌。　又【集韻】山連也。【梁劉峻詩】鑿戸闚嶕嶢，開軒望嶄崱。又【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】崱繒綾而龍鱗。【註】謂參差不齊，如龍鱗然。互見前屴字註。

崱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
崱字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zè］
["Guangyun" Shiliqie, entry, Chong. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) Uneven appearance.
(2) See "崱屴" and "屴崱".
崱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　崱; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 315 16
【Guangyun】Siliqie 【Jiyun】【Yunhui】Cut sideways,? Sound. Weiqi, the mountain is big.　[Jiyun] Mountain Lian Ye. [Liang Liujun Poems] Chisel and peek at the ridges, open the penthouse and look at the ridges. And [Wang Yanshou·Lu Lingguang Temple Fu] Ling Ling Ling and dragon scales. [Note] That is uneven, like dragon scales. See each other's notes on the words before 屴.
